item.title: CalcProgrammer1/OpenRGB
item.description: Open source RGB lighting control that doesn’t depend on manufacturer software. Supports Windows, Linux, MacOS. Mirror of https://gitlab.com/CalcProgrammer1/OpenRGB. Releases can be found on GitLab.

item.title: An-anonymous-coder/Open-Source-Everything
item.description: Open Source Everything: A curated list of the best open source software
